title: Powerful
body: Crushes frozen berries easily; smoothies in under 30 seconds

title: Leaks
body: Started leaking at the seal after 2 months of daily use

title: Too loud
body: Motor is loud on high, wakes up the house

title: Easy clean
body: Cups and lids clean fine in dishwasher; blade needs hand wash

title: Small batch
body: 24oz is enough for one person; too small for family smoothies

title: Broke lid
body: One lid cracked after 3 weeks; support sent a replacement

title: Pulse control
body: Pulse mode is handy; two speeds only

title: No glass option
body: Wish it came with glass jars; only plastic cups included
